item.title: End AZ-66 At I-40/US-93
item.description: End AZ-66 West at I-40/US-93 Jct. Historic Loop US-66 continues west through downtown Kingman.

item.title: End AZ-66 West At I-40/US-93
item.description: End AZ-66 west at I-40/US-93 jct. Use I-40 West/US-93 North for Los Angeles and Las Vegas. Use I-40 East/US-93 South for Phoenix and Flagstaff. Continue straight for Andy Devine Avenue and Historic Loop US-66.

item.title: I-40 West at AZ-66
item.description: I-40 west at AZ-66 (and Historic Loop US-66) at Exit 53 onramp. Use AZ-66 east for Peach Springs and Kingman Airport.

item.title: I-40 West - Exits 53 and 51
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 53 - Historic Loop US-66/AZ-66 East/Andy Devine Ave./Kingman Airport. Approaching Exit 51 - Stockton Hill Road.

item.title: For Historic US-66 Use Exit 53
item.description: For Historic US-66 to Peach Springs use Exit 53. The Arizona Scenic Byway symbol is on the top left of this sign. Historic US-66 through Arizona between Topock and Ash Fork is called the Historic Route 66 National Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-40 West - Kingman Exits
item.description: Kingman exits on I-40 west: Historic Loop US-66/AZ-66/Andy Devine Ave., Stockton Hill Road, US-93 Beale St.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 53
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 53 - Historic Loop US-66/AZ-66 East/Andy Devine Ave./Kingman Airport.
